name: CollisionCastHit
desc: A hit result of a collision cast.

items.name: var distance: Float
items.desc: The distance from the ray origin to the hit, or the convex shape travel distance.

items.name: static func == (CollisionCastHit, CollisionCastHit) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two cast hits are equal.

items.name: static func != (CollisionCastHit, CollisionCastHit) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two cast queries are not equal.
